qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Kingsport General Hospital and Parker City Hospital, what is the occupation of patients A. Davis and E. Cruz?

content: Occupation and Working Conditions: Retired teacher.
Occupation and Working Conditions: Retired Teacher

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Kingsport General Hospital, patient A. Davis is retired; according to the hospitalization records of Parker City Hospital, patient E. Cruz is a retired teacher.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Kingsport General Hospital and Parker City Hospital, what is the marital status of patients A. Davis and E. Cruz?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Kingsport General Hospital, patient A. Davis is widowed; according to the hospitalization records of Parker City Hospital, patient E. Cruz is also widowed.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Kingsport General Hospital and Parker City Hospital, what is the allergy history of patients A. Davis and E. Cruz?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Kingsport General Hospital, patient A. Davis is allergic to penicillin (rash); according to the hospitalization records of Parker City Hospital, patient E. Cruz is also allergic to penicillin.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Kingsport General Hospital and Parker City Hospital, what is the blood pressure of patients A. Davis and E. Cruz?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Kingsport General Hospital, patient A. Davis has a blood pressure of 140/85 mmHg; according to the hospitalization records of Parker City Hospital, patient E. Cruz has a blood pressure of 140/90 mmHg.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Kingsport General Hospital and Parker City Hospital, what are the chief complaints of patients A. Davis and E. Cruz?

content: Sour, heavy, swollen, and painful right lower limb for 6 months; worsening over the last week.
Facial changes and increasing shoe size for 6 months

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Kingsport General Hospital, patient A. Davis's chief complaint is a sour, heavy, swollen, and painful right lower limb for 6 months, worsening over the last week; according to the hospitalization records of Parker City Hospital, patient E. Cruz's chief complaint is facial changes and increasing shoe size for 6 months.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Kingsport General Hospital and Parker City Hospital, who was admitted earlier, A. Davis or E. Cruz?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: A. Davis was admitted on March 1st, and E. Cruz was admitted on April 12th. A. Davis was admitted earlier.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Kingsport General Hospital and Parker City Hospital, whose blood pressure is higher, A. Davis or E. Cruz?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: A. Davis's blood pressure is 140/85 mmHg, and E. Cruz's blood pressure is 140/90 mmHg. E. Cruz's blood pressure is higher.
